aircraft.value: Spectre Night - AC-1472-201 at Regional Depot-B

defect_observed.value: Actuator rod end play exceeding tolerance. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 06/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 08/04/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 08/04/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 11/04/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 16/04/2024 Signature: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
